meanings.definition: An arrangement of five objects with one at each corner of a rectangle and one in the center.
meanings.sent1: The garden had quincunxes of colorful flowers planted in a rectangular pattern.
meanings.sent2: The quincunxes of trees in the park created a beautiful geometric layout.
meanings.sent3: The quincunxes of cupcakes on the table looked like a delicious floral arrangement.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry box was organized with quincunxes of precious stones, each shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The quincunxes of stars in the night sky formed a perfect constellation.

meanings.definition: A pattern of five dots arranged in a square with one at each corner and one in the center.
meanings.sent1: The dice showed a quincunxes of dots, indicating a high number.
meanings.sent2: The quincunxes of dots on the dice made it easy to determine the roll.
meanings.sent3: The quincunxes of dots on the ladybug's back were perfectly symmetrical.
meanings.sent4: The quincunxes of dots on the dominoes made the game more challenging.
meanings.sent5: The quincunxes of dots on the playing card were arranged in a unique design.
